title: Prep&Reactions-Polymers
description: A detailed treatment of the reactions involved in the synthesis of both human-made and natural polymers, including preparation and degradative reactions of polymer systems. Crosslisted with CHEM and PTFE 6750
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: CHBE 4775 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 4775 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or ME 4775 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MSE 4775 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PTFE 4775 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
